Description: The amino acid sequence of the peptide
The number of occurrences of the peptide in sequences of the reference proteome
Ranking criteria: red if greater than 1, green otherwise

Description: Post-translational modifications including the residue position in the protein
There are no PTMs reported in Uniprot for the peptide
The number of methionine residues in the peptide sequence
Ranking criteria: green if zero or red if greater than zero

Description: The number of missed enzymatic cleavages
Ranking criteria: green if zero or red if greater than zero

Description: If the enzyme is trypsin, the amino acid in the first position of the peptide sequence. D or E in this position indicate a probable missed enzymatic cleavage
Ranking criteria: red if D or E, green otherwise

Description: If the enzyme is trypsin, the amino acid that follows the last amino acid of the peptide. D or E in this position indicate a probable missed enzymatic cleavage
Ranking criteria: red if D or E, green otherwise
